DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize propofol desflurane would decrease regional oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) propofol likely reduce rSO2 sevoflurane patient raise sit position .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hypothesize propofol desflurane would decrease rSO2 propofol likely reduce rSO2 sevoflurane patient raise sit position . Therefore , purpose study investigate effect desflurane propofol rSO2 value beach chair position shoulder arthroscopy .
DOC.criteria: Forty patient , ASA class I II , undergo shoulder arthroscopy Patients history cerebrovascular disease , coronary occlusive disease and/or obesity ( body mass index > 30 ) exclude study .
